title: Command Sawtooth Picture Hangers, Damage Free Hanging Frame Hangers, No Tools Wall Hooks for Hanging Sawtooth Frames in Living Spaces, 4 White Picture Frame Hangers and 8 Command Strips
description: Command White Sawtooth Picture Hangers inspire endless possibilities for personal decorations, as they hang frames with sawtooth backs damage free, without the use of nails or tools. A great home improvement item, these picture frame hanger hooks stick on a variety of smooth surfaces without leaving holes, marks or residue. Use these wall hooks to hang framed pictures, mirrors and canvas art. Mount these no damage wall hangers on painted walls, ﬁnished wood, painted concrete cinder blocks, laminate, glass and tiles and enjoy the damage free hanging of your favorite decor. Perfect for home renovators and students, use these wall hooks for hanging Sawtooth frames in your home, office or dorm to elevate the appearance of your living or working space without tools. Directions are included that show how to use the wall hangers. Apply large Command Refill Strips to relocate your Command Sawtooth Hangers to a new area. A clever decorating and organizing solution that doesn’t damage surfaces, these picture frame hangers will help you fearlessly change your space. One package contains four white frame hangers and eight large Command Strips. Each Command Picture Hanger will hold up to 4 pounds. Decorate, organize and celebrate damage free with Command.
